name: mapreduce.job.speculative.retry-after-no-speculate
explanation: The log indicates that a speculative task is being added. This configuration option controls the waiting time to do the next round of speculation if there is no task speculated in this round. The current value may be too low, causing excessive speculation and potential performance issues.

name: io.bytes.per.checksum
explanation: This configuration option is missing a value. It controls the number of bytes per checksum, which is important for data integrity during data transfer. The absence of this value could potentially cause issues in data transfer, although it is not directly indicated in the provided log.

name: yarn.nodemanager.log.deletion-threads-count
explanation: This configuration option controls the number of threads used for log deletion in the NodeManager. While it is not directly indicated in the provided log, improper configuration of this option could potentially cause issues in log management and overall system performance.
